content.p: Applying for an Employment Pass (EP) is a must for all International staff. Employment Pass issuance is strictly at the approval of the Malaysian Immigration Department (MID). Finding a temporary accommodation (rent) in Malaysia has never been easier with the varies website that you may visit for reference. www.propertyguru.com www.iproperty.com.my Workers are subject to income tax deduction. International staff are required to pay a tax rate of 28% for the first 6 months. More information on Malaysian tax available in the following link: www.hasil.gov.my telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: hr@nottingham.edu.my
